Author: wildermonsters
Text: ~tmi comment~ Water for digestion hangs out in your body for 48-72 hours, and you pee it all out right before you poop. The more you eat, the more water you need to digest all the food. Water is HEAVY like 1L is 2.2 pounds and you could fit that amount in just your stomach during one meal. Trust me - I'm crazy about observing my bodily functions and if you really want an answer for how long the water will stay then eat corn for one meal and watch your body do magic.

Author: snefferu
Text: You might find that even if you eat over maintenance you don’t gain, or even lose. I’m almost same stats as you and eating over 2500 to gain, but it’s slow and some days I see plateau or even loss. Don’t freak out, weight does not pile on like you’d expect it to!
